alternate_name: Love Is Respect, formerkly known as National Dating Abuse Helpline
description:
Loveisrespect is a national, 24-hour resource specifically designed for teens and young adults who want to prevent and end abusive relationships. Accessible by phone or internet, Loveisrespect operates from a call center in Austin, Texas.

name: LOVEISRESPECT
